mapper.select: SELECT email, pw, name, phone, level, create_time, update_time, account_num, account_name, status FROM user WHERE email = #{email};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( email, pw, name, phone, level, create_time, update_time, account_num, account_name, status ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{level}, now(), now(), #{account_num}, #{account_name}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET pw = #{password}, update_time = now() WHERE email = #{email}

UPDATE user SET phone = #{phone}, update_time = now(), account_num = #{account_num}, account_name = #{account_name} WHERE email = #{email}
